CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Officials of Shop Owners Committee - A trio of the heads of the Beauty Shop Owners, Inc. convention committee are pictured here. Front, left: Mrs. Elma Walls, publicity chairman, and Mrs. Mildred Brown, chairman of convention committee, front, with Mrs. Ida V. Neil, second vice president of the association, top. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauty shop owners from left: Elma Walls, Ida V. Neil standing, and Mildred Brown, posed in front of dark curtain, in Harris Studio
